product_name: Mavic Ksyrium SLR Wheelset with Tires
long_description: The updated Ksyrium SLR aluminum wheelset synthesizes light weight, stiffness and reliability to maximize speed. At the heart of it is new ISM 4D advanced rim weight-saving technology from Mavic.
short_description: The updated Ksyrium SLR aluminum wheelset synthesizes light weight, stiffness and reliability to maximize speed. At the heart of it is new ISM 4D advanced rim weight-saving technology from Mavic.
